column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Heather - Thank you so much for the stars. My general manager Keith lived in New York for more than a decade
column2: so he always takes pride in hearing from other New Yorkers who say our ramen is "bona fide." I can also say that you are correct -- everyone inside JINYA works hard. There's really no other way we could operate otherwise. Some days are better than others
column3: and when we stumble we do our best to make amends
column4: dust ourselves off and get back up and keep moving forward. So when I read a review like yours
column5: it feels good to know our effort is being noticed. Thank you again
column6: and we look forward to serving you in the future.
